Account_1.last_error:
Could not find LinkedIn ID for URL: https://www.linkedin.com/in/tatiana-kravets/ (username: tatiana-kravets). This can happen when:
• User profile is private or not searchable via API
• LinkedIn has anti-scraping measures active
• User changed their LinkedIn username recently
• Unipile API rate limits or restrictions

WORKAROUND: Send invitation manually:
1. Go to Unipile dashboard
2. Navigate to LinkedIn account
3. Send invitation to: https://www.linkedin.com/in/tatiana-kravets/
4. Once accepted, messages will work automatically
